item.title: LG 能源解决方案与通用汽车的合资公司向美国子公司出售 20 亿美元资产
item.description: LG 能源解决方案公司周二表示，其与通用汽车的合资企业将向通用汽车的美国分公司出售价值 20 亿美元的资产。【原文：LG Energy Solution said on Tuesday that its joint venture with General Motors would sell $2 billion worth of assets to its U.S. unit.】

item.title: 阿尔斯通延长纽约肯尼迪机场空中列车合同
item.description: 法国火车制造商阿尔斯通集团周二表示，该公司已签署了一份为期七年的续约合同，用于运营和维护其在纽约肯尼迪机场的空中列车。【原文：Train maker Alstom has signed a seven-year contract extension for the operations and maintenance of its AirTrains at the John F. Kennedy airport in New York, the French group said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，SpaceX 希望在越南建立拥有多个地面站的星链（Starlink）中心
item.description: 两名知情人士告诉路透社，SpaceX 正在越南为 Starlink 卫星准备一个地面站，并计划建造更多的地面站。【原文：SpaceX is readying a ground station in Vietnam for Starlink satellites and plans many more, two people with knowledge of the talks told Reuters, in a move that would herald its launch in the country and would help authorities police internet traffic.】

item.title: 汉莎航空表示，尽管边境政策更加严格，但美国预订量没有下降
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Lufthansa）财务总监表示，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）采取了更严格的边境政策，但该公司往返美国的机票预订量并未出现下降。【原文：German airline Lufthansa has not experienced a decline in bookings to and from the United States despite a stricter border policy under President Donald Trump, its finance chief said.】

item.title: 英国最高法院审理 "秘密 "汽车融资委员会案，银行面临焦虑等待
item.description: 本周二，英国最高法院将开庭审理一起有关汽车金融佣金的上诉案，英国金融监管部门将审议一项向消费者支付数十亿英镑赔偿金的计划，各大银行将焦急地关注着这起上诉案。【原文：Major banks will be anxiously watching an appeal over motor finance commissions, which begins at the UK's Supreme Court on Tuesday as Britain's financial watchdog considers a scheme to pay out billions of pounds in compensation to consumers.】

item.title: 分析师报告称，梅赛德斯-奔驰在加征关税前在美国储备库存
item.description: 据分析师指出，梅赛德斯-奔驰公司高管在周一的电话会议上向分析师表示，梅赛德斯-奔驰正在美国批发市场和经销商处增加库存，以应对4月3日开始征收的关税。【原文：Mercedes-Benz is building up inventory levels in the U.S. at the wholesale level and at dealer lots to get ahead of tariffs due to be collected from April 3, executives told analysts on a call on Monday, according to notes by analysts.】

item.title: 据 Air Current 报道，波音公司将 737 Max 的月产量降至 31 架
item.description: 据美国《Air Current》网站周二报道，波音公司因机翼生产延误，将737 MAX飞机的月产量从38架减至31架。【原文：Boeing slowed the production of 737 MAX airplanes to 31 per month from 38 over wing production delays, the Air Current website reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the progress of the planemaker's Renton, Washington factory.】

item.title: 中国小米称在致命事故后积极与警方合作
item.description: 中国小米公司周二表示，在 3 月 29 日一辆 SU7 汽车发生致命事故后，该公司正积极与警方合作，并移交了驾驶和系统数据。【原文：China's Xiaomi said on Tuesday that it was actively cooperating with police after a fatal accident of an SU7 car on March 29 and handed over driving and system data.】

item.title: 欧洲 "解放日 "前的深呼吸
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行维持利率稳定，警告 "明显的 "全球风险
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周二一如市场普遍预期维持现金利率稳定，并表示尽管美国关税风险可能拖累全球经济增长，但央行对经济前景仍持谨慎态度。【原文：Australia's central bank on Tuesday left its cash rate steady as widely expected, saying it was still cautious about the outlook, although the risk is U.S. tariffs could be a drag on global growth.】

item.title: 韩国监管机构质疑韩华航空航天公司发行 25 亿美元股票的目的
item.description: 韩国金融市场监督机构周二表示，韩华航空航天公司需要更好地解释拟议中的 3.6 万亿韩元（24.6 亿美元）股权融资如何与更广泛的公司重组计划相匹配。【原文：South Korea's financial market watchdog said on Tuesday that Hanwha Aerospace needed to better explain how a proposed 3.6 trillion won ($2.46 billion) equity raising fits with a broader plan to restructure the company.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国交易公司 Jane Street 寻求迅速扩大香港办公空间
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士称，全球最大的量化交易公司和做市商之一简街公司正计划大幅增加香港的办公面积。【原文：Jane Street, one of the world's largest quant trading firms and market makers, is planning a sharp increase in Hong Kong office space, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 特朗普关税计划引发通胀担忧，黄金创历史新高
item.description: 由于担心美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的对等关税可能会助长通胀压力并阻碍经济增长，避险需求推动金价在周二创下历史新高。【原文：Gold prices hit a record peak on Tuesday, as concerns that U.S. President Donald Trump's reciprocal tariffs might fuel inflationary pressures and impede economic growth drove safe-haven demand.】

item.title: 美国关税削弱信心，亚洲工厂活动减弱
item.description: 在一系列普遍低迷的采购经理人指数中，中国是一个例外，这表明世界第二大经济体的经济活动正在回升。【原文：China was one outlier among a broadly downbeat set of purchasing managers' indexes, showing activity in the world's second-largest economy is picking up.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税前股市企稳，黄金创纪录
item.description: 继华尔街隔夜上涨之后，周二亚洲股市上涨，黄金创下历史新高，国债收益率下跌，因为市场在等待美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对等关税的细节。【原文：Asian equities rose on Tuesday following Wall Street's overnight gains, while gold hit an all-time peak and Treasury yields fell as markets awaited details of U.S. President Donald Trump's reciprocal tariffs.】

item.title: 日本东京燃气公司与雪佛龙公司达成交易，进军美国页岩气领域
item.description: 东京天然气公司（Tokyo Gas）和卡斯尔顿商品国际公司（Castleton Commodities International）共同拥有的 TG 自然资源有限责任公司（TGNR）周二表示，该公司以 5.25 亿美元的价格从雪佛龙公司（Chevron）手中收购了得克萨斯州东部天然气资产 70% 的股份，以扩大其美国天然气业务。【原文：TG Natural Resources LLC (TGNR), co-owned by Tokyo Gas and Castleton Commodities International, has bought a 70% stake in the east Texas gas assets from Chevron for $525 million, the company said on Tuesday, as it expands its U.S. gas business.】

item.title: 中国批评巴拿马港口交易，长江和记股价攀升 1
item.description: 香港企业集团长江和记的股价周二攀升了 1%，因为该集团将于 4 月 2 日与贝莱德（BlackRock）领导的集团签署出售巴拿马港口的协议。【原文：Shares of Hong Kong conglomerate CK Hutchison climbed 1% on Tuesday ahead of a deal to sell its Panama ports to a BlackRock-led group that is due to be signed by April 2.】

item.title: 特朗普征收对等关税前美元持稳，澳大利亚央行会议前澳元走软
item.description: 由于投资者担心美国总统唐纳德-特朗普本周将征收对等关税，美元在经历了一个跌宕起伏的季度后于周二持稳，而澳元则在央行政策决定出台前徘徊在四周低点附近。【原文：The dollar was steady on Tuesday after a bruising quarter as investors braced for reciprocal tariffs from U.S. President Donald Trump this week, while the Australian dollar hovered near a four-week low ahead of the central bank's policy decision.】

item.title: 白宫因 "信号 "丑闻受到冲击，称案件已结案
item.description: 特朗普政府周一试图将其使用 Signal 消息应用程序的丑闻抛诸脑后，称其已经结案，尽管这一漏洞引发了两党的批评，并揭开了白宫内部的分歧。【原文：The Trump administration sought to put the scandal over its use of the Signal messaging app behind it on Monday, calling it case closed, even as the breach provoked bipartisan criticism and opened up divisions inside the White House.】

item.title: Lightmatter 发布用于人工智能芯片的新型光子技术
item.description: 估值 44 亿美元的初创公司 Lightmatter 周一发布了两项技术，旨在加速人工智能芯片之间的连接。【原文：Lightmatter, a startup valued at $4.4 billion, on Monday released two pieces of technology aimed at speeding up the connections between artificial intelligence chips.】

item.title: 尽管俄罗斯供应受到威胁，但贸易战忧虑仍令油价下跌
item.description: 由于对贸易战影响全球经济增长的担忧超过了对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁对俄罗斯原油征收二次关税和轰炸伊朗对供应造成打击的担忧，周二油价小幅下跌。【原文：Oil prices dipped slightly on Tuesday as worries about the impact of a trade war on global growth outweighed concerns about a hit to supply from threats by U.S. President Donald Trump to impose secondary tariffs on Russian crude and bomb Iran.】

item.title: 矿业公司淡水河谷将在 Alianca Energia 合资公司交易中获得 10 亿美元收益
item.description: 巴西矿业公司淡水河谷周一表示，同意通过其巴西可再生能源业务 Alianca Energia 与美国投资公司 Global Infrastructure Partners (GIP) 组建合资企业。【原文：Brazilian miner Vale said on Monday it agreed to form a joint venture with U.S.-based investment firm Global Infrastructure Partners (GIP) through its Brazilian renewable energy business Alianca Energia.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 2 月份零售额微增 0.2
item.description: 澳大利亚 2 月份的零售额连续第二个月小幅增长，原因是期待已久的降息与通胀放缓相结合，提振了消费者情绪和消费能力。【原文：Australian retail sales rose modestly for a second straight month in February as a long-awaited cut in interest rates combined with slower inflation to boost consumer sentiment and spending power.】

item.title: 日本制造业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，日本工厂活动降幅回升
item.description: 周二的一项私营部门调查显示，由于需求减弱和美国贸易战升级给制造业前景蒙上阴影，日本 3 月份的工厂活动加速下滑。【原文：Japan's factory activity declines accelerated in March as demand weakened and the escalating U.S. trade war clouded the manufacturing outlook, a private-sector survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 挪威主权财富基金将投票反对力拓双重上市审查决议
item.description: 挪威主权财富基金网站显示，挪威银行投资管理公司（Norges Bank Investment Management）将投票反对矿业巨头力拓（Rio Tinto）审查其在伦敦和悉尼两地上市的决议。【原文：Norges Bank Investment Management will vote against a resolution for mining major Rio Tinto to review its two listings in London and Sydney, the website for Norway's sovereign wealth fund showed.】

item.title: 特朗普关税不确定性挥之不去，日本商业情绪恶化
item.description: 日本央行周二的一项调查显示，在截至 3 月份的三个月里，日本大型制造商的商业景气恶化，这表明不断升级的贸易紧张局势已经对依赖出口的日本经济造成了影响。【原文：Business sentiment among big Japanese manufacturers worsened in the three months to March, a central bank survey showed on Tuesday, a sign escalating trade tensions were already taking a toll on the export-reliant economy.】

item.title: 美国法官驳回 J&J 100 亿美元婴儿爽身粉和解协议
item.description: 周一，一名美国破产法官驳回了强生公司提出的 100 亿美元终止指控其婴儿爽身粉和其他滑石粉产品导致卵巢癌的诉讼的建议，这是该公司的破产策略第三次在法庭上失败。【原文：A U.S. bankruptcy judge on Monday rejected Johnson & Johnson's $10 billion proposal to end lawsuits alleging that its baby powder and other talc products cause ovarian cancer, marking the third time the company's bankruptcy strategy has failed in court.】

item.title: 法国 3 月汽车注册量下降 14.54%，特斯拉销量下降 36.83
item.description: 法国汽车机构PFA周二公布的数据显示，3月份法国新车注册量为153,842辆，同比下降14.54%。【原文：New car registrations in France fell 14.54% in March from a year earlier to 153,842 vehicles, data from French car body PFA showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国法官驳回 J&J 100 亿美元婴儿爽身粉和解协议
item.description: 周一，一名美国破产法官驳回了强生公司提出的 100 亿美元终止指控其婴儿爽身粉和其他滑石粉产品导致卵巢癌的诉讼的建议，这是该公司的破产策略第三次在法庭上失败。【原文：A U.S. bankruptcy judge on Monday rejected Johnson & Johnson's $10 billion proposal to end lawsuits alleging that its baby powder and other talc products cause ovarian cancer, marking the third time the company's bankruptcy strategy has failed in court.】

item.title: 美国贸易代表办公室在特朗普征收对等关税前发布贸易壁垒报告
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提议对全球贸易伙伴征收对等关税的前两天，他的政府于周一发布了一份百科全书式的清单，列出了被其视为贸易壁垒的外国政策和法规。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's administration released an encyclopedic list of foreign countries' policies and regulations it regards as trade barriers on Monday, two days before he proposed hitting global trading partners with reciprocal tariffs.】
